name: Dialga G LV.X
author: Mitsuhiro Arita

poke_body.name: Time Crystal
poke_body.effect: Each Pokémon (both yours and your opponent’s) (excluding Pokémon SP) can’t use any Poké-Bodies.

attacks.name: Remove Lost
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, remove an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon and put it in the Lost Zone.

rule_box: Put this card onto your Active Dialga G. Dialga G LV.X can use any attack, Poké-Power, or Poké-Body from its previous level.
